elements.text: After noticing your throat hurting a bit, you decide to go to the doctor. Your partner barely goes to the doctor because it's so expensive, and you think they'll be mad at you for the cost. You hope that they'll forgive you easily, because getting sick isn't fully in your...

elements.name: Medical Guilt_Physical Health_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
